mapper.select: select id, password, name, CONCAT(if(lev='A', '관리자', IF(lev='B', '나무', IF(lev='C', '잎새', '새싹'))),' ',lev) lev, birthd, point, weight, rid, uploadfile from member order by id
mapper.update: update member set password=#{password},name=#{name}, lev=#{lev}, birthd=#{birthd} , point=#{point},weight=#{weight},rid=#{rid},uploadfile=#{uploadfile} where id=#{id}
